ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Operation: Darklon: Three stories: The Joes go to capture Darklon to gain knowledge about Cobra's new mind control scheme, with both Lady Jaye and Darklon injured in the process; Chuckles continues to question Sneak Peek about his covert mission into Darklonia; Snake-Eyes, Billy, and Storm Shadow continue to speak w/the Russian Arashikage ninja clan as they reveal their origin before being hit by Blue ninjas.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:58:30. [CVDB297291] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:37:10. [Issue ID 887148]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Gary Erskine,Herb Trimpe,James Brown (J. Brown),S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Russian Arashikage ninjas,Recondo,Lady Jaye,Storm Shadow,G.I. Joe [Snake-Eyes,Flint,Roadblock,Renegade Blue Ninjas,G.I. Jane [Jane]],Sneak Peek,Darklon,Darklon's army,Lift Ticket,Cobra [Python Patrol],Mainframe,Katya,G.I. Joe,Billy,Wild Bill,Chuckles
ComicInfo.Title: Operation: Darklon
